synopsis.text:
Black Lodge, a nefarious organization, threatens the peace of Arkham City, and the only hope lies in an unlikely alliance between a struggling detective and a magical grimoire. Kuro Daijuuji, a detective with more bills than clients, receives a lucrative offer from Ruri Hado, the head of the powerful Hado Financial Group, to locate an ancient and powerful magic book. As Kuro embarks on his search, fate intervenes when he crosses paths with Al, a mysterious girl who is, in fact, the very grimoire he seeks.

Forced into a contract to protect each other from the relentless pursuit of the Black Lodge, Kuro and Al unleash formidable magical abilities. Together, they awaken Demonbane, a mighty deus machina under the Hado Financial Group's control, and spark a war between the two powerful factions. As the battle escalates, Kuro and Al must navigate the treacherous world of magic, machinery, and corporate intrigue to protect Arkham City and uncover the secrets of the elusive grimoire. Join Kuro and Al in their thrilling adventure as they fight against the odds to restore peace to their city.
